title: Avatar
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: avatar-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: 20067
	- preferred-term:: Avatar
	- status:: draft
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: Digital representation of a person or agent used to interact within a virtual environment.
	- source:: [[ACM + Web3D HAnim]]
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: mv:Avatar
	- owl:physicality:: VirtualEntity
	- owl:role:: Agent
	- owl:inferred-class:: mv:VirtualAgent
	- owl:functional-syntax:: true
	- belongsToDomain:: [[InteractionDomain]]
	- implementedInLayer:: [[UserExperienceLayer]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: avatar-relationships
	  collapsed:: true
		- is-subclass-of:: [[ArtificialIntelligence]]

		- enables:: [[User Embodiment]]
		- enables:: [[Social Presence]]
	- #### CrossDomainBridges
	  id:: avatar-bridges
	  collapsed:: true
		- dt:uses:: [[Machine Learning]]
		- dt:uses:: [[Computer Vision]]

ontology.definition: Digital representation of a person or agent used to interact within a virtual environment.
